name: The Curses of Solomon
description:
I am Cursed!

The game is cursed and has problem with percentage based-damage.
You may rate this game based on this version but if you plan to replay please use this link for the fixed version : https://carrastgoc.itch.io/the-curses-of-solomon-fixed

 

How To Play?

1) Select Contracts

Each player will gain a new contract every turn by default.

Select contracts that you would like to pay the cost of your LP to summon demons to land curses on the opponent.

You may skip selections to time your strategy.

There are 72 different types of contract in total.

 

2) Press "Summon"

Press the "Summon" button  to bind with selected contracts and summon respective demons to land curses.

Each player can have 5 active curses only. 

Curses activated from older contracts will be overwritten by new contracts.  

Overspending LP cost is not lethal until you are damaged.

 

3) Game Ends When Either Player Reaches 0 LP

Deploy your strategy based on various curse effects to damage your opponent to 0 LP to win the game.

Older curses have higher priority unless modified.
